title: Belltown Great Views Luxury 2 Bd 2 Ba 16th Floor Condo
posting_body: ['Lovely Belltown!!', 'Quieter end of downtown, near Seattle Center, Myrtle Edwards Park and more.', '97 Walk Score Beautiful building art-deco style.', '‘Inter-generational Vertical Village.’', 'Great two bedroom, two bath condo.', 'Panoramic view High Ceilings on the 16th floor of this fabulous building - See Videos below.', 'Huge Windows to the Ceiling.', 'Most Convenient downtown living is here at Seattle Heights, between Vine and Cedar.', 'Residents are within minutes of work and play, as this condo in this central location would mean no commute to your downtown office or those critical appointments.', 'Those commuting further away as this owner commuted to the Eastside, I-5, I-90 and the 520 bridge are all easily accessible.', 'Close to the waterfront.', 'Seattle Center, Pike Place Market, Key Arena, the Sculpture Park, the Cruise Ship Marina, So.', "Lake Union, Capitol Hill, First Hill, numerous music avenues, art galleries, Auction Houses, museums, the Opera House - all of downtown are literally on 'Your' doorstep!", 'Lovely large mirror reflect the Olympic Mountains and the Puget Sound into the condo.', 'Seattle Heights has 24/7 lobby staff-concierge services to provide a welcome to you and your visitors and offer great concierge Services.', 'The Amenities are outstanding in our building - heated lap pool, jacuzzi, sauna, fantastic gym with marvelous equipment, great roof terraces north and south, large community room, reservable, with a great kitchen, large TV and fireplace.', "large TV and fireplace, all with wonderful views and with the roof terraces provide a gallery seat for July 4th and New Year Eve's fireworks displays!", 'Seattle Heights has its own business center with computer, printer and fax machines.', 'Great common spaces to relax, read, converse in.', 'Sprinkler system.', 'Central AC and heating.', 'In unit full size washer dryer.', 'Well fitted kitchen.', 'Lanai/Balcony Imported stone and textured tile, granite are beautiful and utilized throughout the condo itself and the building.', 'Key card access.', 'More interior photos at link on website', '<URL>/']
